installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

# Install build tools
echo "deb http://deb.debian.org/debian bullseye-backports main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list && \
apt-get update && apt-get -y full-upgrade && \
    apt-get install -y build-essential wget git ccache ninja-build libssl-dev pkg-config libarchive-tools \
    cmake/bullseye-backports cmake-data/bullseye-backports


# Shallow clone yuzu repository, since we delete the local copy afterwards
git clone --depth 1 -j4 --recursive --shallow-submodules https://github.com/yuzu-emu/yuzu-mainline.git /mnt/server/yuzu-mainline

# Download build tools and build
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/yuzu-emu/yuzu-multiplayer-dedicated.git /mnt/server/build-files
cd /mnt/server/yuzu-mainline && /mnt/server/build-files/.ci/build.sh

# Copy server binary to container root
cp /mnt/server/yuzu-mainline/build/bin/yuzu-room /mnt/server/yuzu-room

# Delete git repo's to save disk space.
rm -rf /mnt/server/yuzu-mainline && rm -rf /mnt/server/build-files
